== Django ==

== Install ==
> pip install django

=== Start Project ===
> django-admin startproject ${project_name}
- creates folder named ${project_name} 
- go into ${project_name} subdir to run manage.py processes

> python manage.py runserver 
- runs the dev server

=== URL Request ===
* urls.py => receive requests and fires callback
* views.py => resolves callbacks
* URLs use regex
